## TestFixtures interface

Set of [fixtures](https://playwright.dev/docs/test-fixtures) provided by assistive-playwright-test at the test level.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TestFixtures extends TestOptions 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [TestOptions](./assistive-playwright-test.testoptions.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [vmMouse](./assistive-playwright-test.testfixtures.vmmouse.md) | [VMMouse](./assistive-playwright-client.vmmouse.md) | Reference to the VMMouse object that allows to control the mouse at the virtual machine level. It is automatically calibrated to the current page, which means it is possible to pass coordinates relative to the viewport of the current page. |
